name: carbonMonoxideDetection_getStatus
description: This function is used to check the carbon monoxide level in the house or on SmartThings devices.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the carbon monoxide detection is being checked.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the carbon monoxide detection is being checked.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to check the carbon monoxide level.
